items.title: Israel PM says Hamas's Gaza chief Mohammed Sinwar has been killed
items.description: Mohammed Sinwar was the target of a Israeli strike on the courtyard of the European hospital in Khan Younis on 13 May.

items.title: German chancellor promises to help Ukraine produce long-range missiles
items.description: Friedrich Merz said earlier there were "no longer" any range restrictions on weapons supplied by Kyiv's Western allies.

items.title: Namibia marks colonial genocide for first time with memorial day
items.description: Concentration camps and pseudoscientific experiments were used by German officials to torture and kill.

items.title: Kenyan president apologises to Tanzania over deportation row
items.description: It follows growing criticism from Kenyans targeting Tanzania's president over the recent deportation of activists.

items.title: EU says Israeli strikes in Gaza 'go beyond what is necessary' to fight Hamas
items.description: Kaja Kallas, the EU's top diplomat, says the bloc also does not support a new aid distribution model which bypasses the UN and other humanitarian orga...
